name: Mumb Mountain (GreeGrenn, smoshypancakes888)
description:
Climb Mumb Mountain and collect as many crystals as you can as you explore four levels! Try to find the three rare large crystals in each level as well! Only left and right arrow keys are used to play. Get the flag in each level to proceed to the next one.

This is an improved version of a game I made for the two button jam (https://greegrenn.itch.io/mumb-mountain-original). Feedback is welcome and encouraged!

Controls:

Left and right arrow keys are for changing direction, jumping, and holding, depending on the state of the player:

-in mid air: grab rock with hand (start climbing)

-on ground: change direction or jump

-hold both keys (about a second) while holding rock: charge jump to break blocks

Credits:

-made with Unity

-spooky pixel font: https://rhaskia.itch.io/spooky-pixel-font

-art: GreeGrenn (me), Smoshypancakes888

-development: GreeGrenn (me)

-audio: Smoshypancakes888, Joe Siris
